name: Tengoku Gaiden: 天国黄白機 ～ Submerged Machine of Deepest Desire
name_original: Tengoku Gaiden: 天国黄白機 ～ Submerged Machine of Deepest Desire
description:
Fullscreen is recommended. If you encounter freezing or performance issues, try the download version.

Check out the other Tengoku Project games here! https://itch.io/c/1985316/tengoku-project

Tengoku Kouhakuki

"If used correctly, this machine can grant your deepest desire..."

Miria, the guardian of the Spirit World, has returned to the surface to search for the cause of the earthquakes on Spirit Island. Just when she thinks that having a midday walk interrupted by a human bird is bad, her day gets a whole lot worse...

Controls Move / Navigate menus [Arrow Keys]Shoot / Advance Dialogue[Z]Jump[Space]Bomb[X]Run (only works on desktop, will be fixed in web soon)[Shift]Pause [P]Toggle Fullscreen [Alt] + [Enter] Hints
  • Bombing with a full gauge activates Spirit Mode! Try to absorb as many bullets as possible and send them back to the boss!
  • You have infinite continues, so don't give up!
